mapper.select: SELECT LESSONS.ID , LESSONS.MAX_PARTICIPANTS - COUNT(DISTINCT BOOKINGS.ID) seats_left FROM LESSONS JOIN BOOKINGS ON LESSONS.ID = BOOKINGS.LESSON_ID WHERE LESSONS.TYPE = 'ensemble' AND TO_DATE(BOOKINGS.START_TIME) BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE AND CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '7 DAY' GROUP BY LESSONS.ID ORDER BY LESSONS.GENRE , extract(dow from TO_DATE(BOOKINGS.START_TIME))
